alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 10:59AM CDT until March 25 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. For the Black River...including Neillsville, Black River Falls, Galesville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From this evening to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 43.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 48.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 49.7 feet on 04/20/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM CDT.
